turns.content: create a playlist for my hot boyfriend about Moby Dick with an emphasis on jazz and house music

Here is a playlist of jazz and house music inspired by Moby Dick:

1. "Call Me Ishmael" - DJ Cam
2. "Ahab's Revenge" - Thelonious Monster
3. "Moby Dick Blues" - John Lee Hooker
4. "The White Whale" - Sonny Rollins
5. "Whale Hunt" - Nightmares on Wax
6. "Moby Dick Boogie" - Louis Jordan
7. "Captain Ahab's Theme" - DJ Shadow
8. "The Great White" - St Germain
9. "The Whale's Tale" - Groove Armada
10. "Ishmael's Lament" - Pat Metheny Group

I hope this playlist helps set the mood for your hot boyfriend!
